mapper.select: SELECT CDDATE, CDDD, CDDAYOFWEEK FROM COM_DATE CD WHERE CDYEAR=#{YEAR} AND CDMM=#{MONTH} ORDER BY CDDATE

SELECT SSNO, SDSEQ, SSTITLE, PK_SAWON_CODE, SDHOUR, SDMINUTE, FONTCOLOR FROM ( SELECT NULL SSNO, NULL SDSEQ, SHTITLE SSTITLE, NULL PK_SAWON_CODE, NULL SDHOUR, NULL SDMINUTE, SHCOLOR FONTCOLOR FROM SCH_HOLIDAY SH WHERE SHMONTH=TO_DATE(#{field2}, 'MM') AND SHDATE=TO_DATE(#{field2}, 'DD') AND SH.DELETEFLAG='N' UNION ALL SELECT SD.SSNO, SDSEQ, SSTITLE, SD.PK_SAWON_CODE, SD.SDHOUR, SD.SDMINUTE, NULL FONTCOLOR FROM SCH_DETAIL SD LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE SS ON SS.SSNO=SD.SSNO WHERE SDDATE=#{field2} AND SS.DELETEFLAG='N' AND SS.SSISOPEN='Y' UNION ALL SELECT SD.SSNO, SDSEQ, SSTITLE, SD.PK_SAWON_CODE, SD.SDHOUR, SD.SDMINUTE, NULL FONTCOLOR FROM SCH_DETAIL SD LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE SS ON SS.SSNO=SD.SSNO WHERE SDDATE=#{field2} AND SS.DELETEFLAG='N' AND SS.SSISOPEN='N' AND SD.PK_SAWON_CODE=#{field1} )DS ORDER BY SDHOUR, SDMINUTE, SSNO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE TC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(SSNO, SSTITLE, SSTYPE, SSSTARTDATE, SSSTARTHOUR, SSSTARTMINUTE, SSENDDATE, SSENDHOUR, SSENDMINUTE, SSREPEATTYPE, SSREPEATOPTION, SSREPEATEND, SSCONTENTS, SSISOPEN, PK_SAWON_CODE, UPDATEDATE, INSERTDATE, DELETEFLAG) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SSNO)+1,0) FROM SCHEDULE), #{SSTITLE}, #{SSTYPE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SSSTARTDATE}, #{SSSTARTHOUR}, #{SSSTARTMINUTE}, #{SSENDDATE}, #{SSENDHOUR}, #{SSENDMINUTE}, #{SSREPEATTYPE}, #{SSREPEATOPTION, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SSREPEATEND}, #{SSCONTENTS}, #{SSISOPEN}, #{PK_SAWON_CODE}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), 'N')
INSERT INTO SCH_DETAIL(SSNO, SDSEQ, SDDATE, SDHOUR, SDMINUTE) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(SSNO)+1,0) FROM SCH_DETAIL), #{SDSEQ}, #{SDDATE}, #{SDHOUR}, #{SDMINUTE})
mapper.select: SELECT SSNO, SSTITLE, SSTYPE, SSSTARTDATE, SSSTARTHOUR, SSSTARTMINUTE, SSENDDATE, SSENDHOUR , SSENDMINUTE, SSREPEATTYPE, SSREPEATOPTION, SSREPEATEND, SSCONTENTS, SSISOPEN, TC.PK_SAWON_CODE, SAWON_NAME FROM SCHEDULE TC INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TC.PK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE WHERE TC.DELETEFLAG='N' AND SSNO=#{SSNO}

SELECT SSNO, SSTITLE, CC1.CODENM SSTYPE, SSSTARTDATE, SSSTARTHOUR, SSSTARTMINUTE, SSENDDATE, SSENDHOUR , SSENDMINUTE, SSREPEATTYPE, CC2.CODENM SSREPEATTYPENM, SSREPEATEND, SSCONTENTS, CC3.CODENM SSISOPEN, TC.PK_SAWON_CODE, SAWON_NAME FROM SCHEDULE TC INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TC.PK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE INNER JOIN COM_CODE CC1 ON CC1.CODECD=TC.SSTYPE AND CC1.CLASSNO=4 INNER JOIN COM_CODE CC2 ON CC2.CODECD=TC.SSREPEATTYPE AND CC2.CLASSNO=5 INNER JOIN COM_CODE CC3 ON CC3.CODECD=TC.SSISOPEN AND CC3.CLASSNO=6 WHERE TC.DELETEFLAG='N' AND SSNO=#{SSNO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT CODECD, CODENM FROM COM_CODE WHERE CLASSNO=#{CLASSNO} -- AND DELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY CAST(CODECD AS INT)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COM_CODE CC

SELECT CLASSNO, CODECD, CODENM FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as NO, CLASSNO, CODECD, CODENM FROM COM_CODE TB ORDER by CLASSNO, CODECD) A
AND NO BETWEEN ${rowStart-1} AND ${rowStart+9}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COM_CODE(CLASSNO, CODECD, CODENM) VALUES (#{CLASSNO}, #{CODECD}, #{CODENM})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COM_CODE WHERE CLASSNO=#{CLASSNO} AND CODECD=#{CODECD}
mapper.select: SELECT FK_DEPT_NAME as FIELD1, count(*) as CNT1 FROM SAWON S, HOLIDAY H WHERE S.PK_SAWON_CODE=H.FK_HOLIDAY_SAWON_CODE GROUP BY FK_DEPT_NAME
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AD SD INNER JOIN APPROVAL SS ON SS.FK_AD_NUM=SD.PK_AD_NUM AND SS.APPROVAL_SSSTEP=SD.AD_DOCSTEP WHERE SD.AD_DOCSTATUS IN (1,2) AND SS.PK_SAWON_CODE = #{PK_SAWON_CODE}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AD WHERE AD_DELETEFLAG='N'

select TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(p.person_info_date_birth),'MM-DD') as person_info_date_birth, s.sawon_name, s.fk_dept_name, s.rank_name from PERSON_INFO p, SAWON s where p.fk_sawon_code = s.pk_sawon_code and TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(p.person_info_date_birth),'MM') = to_char(sysdate, 'MM')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as NO, BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDDATE , TB.FK_SAWON_CODE, CU.SAWON_NAME BRDWRITER, BGNAME, TB.BGNO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT FROM BOARD TB INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TB.FK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE INNER JOIN BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBG.BGDELETEFLAG='N' ) A WHERE A.NO <= 5
ORDER BY BRDNO DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as NO, BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDDATE, BRDNOTICE, TB.FK_SAWON_CODE, CU.SAWON_NAME BRDWRITER FROM BOARD TB INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TB.FK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNOTICE='Y' ) A WHERE A.NO <= 6
ORDER BY BRDNO DESC
SELECT BGNO, BGNAME, BGUSED, BGREPLY, BGREADONLY, BGNOTICE FROM BOARDGROUP WHERE BGDELETEFLAG='N' AND BGNO=#{bgno} AND BGUSED='Y'
SELECT BGNO KEY, BGNAME TITLE, BGPARENT PARENT FROM BOARDGROUP WHERE BGDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY BGNO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD TB INNER JOIN BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TB.FK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(BRDNO),0)+1 FROM BOARD
INSERT INTO BOARD(BGNO, BRDNO, BRDTITLE, FK_SAWON_CODE, BRDMEMO, BRDNOTICE, BRDDATE, BRDLIKE, BRDDELETEFLAG) VALUES (#{bgno}, #{brdno}, #{brdtitle}, #{FK_SAWON_CODE}, #{brdmemo}, #{brdnotice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), 0, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT BGNO, BRDNO, BRDTITLE, CU.SAWON_NAME BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDNOTICE, BRDLIKE , BRDDATE, TB.FK_SAWON_CODE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) BRDHIT , (SELECT 1 FROM BOARDLIKE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND FK_SAWON_CODE=#{field2}) BRDLIKECHK FROM BOARD TB INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TB.FK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{field1}
SELECT BRDNO FROM BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{brdno} AND FK_SAWON_CODE=#{FK_SAWON_CODE}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO BOARDREAD USING dual ON (BRDNO = #{field1} AND FK_SAWON_CODE = #{field2}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET READDATE = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(BRDNO, FK_SAWON_CODE, READDATE) VALUES(#{field1}, #{field2}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDLIKE(BLNO, BRDNO, FK_SAWON_CODE, BLDATE) VALUES (BLNO.NEXTVAL, #{field1}, #{field2}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'))
mapper.select: SELECT FILENO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE FROM BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} ORDER BY FILENO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDFILE (FILENO, BRDNO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE) VALUES (FILENO.NEXTVAL, #{parentPK}, #{filename}, #{realname}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, RENO, CU.SAWON_NAME REWRITER, REDELETEFLAG, REMEMO, REDATE, REPARENT, REDEPTH, REORDER, TBR.FK_SAWON_CODE, CU.PHOTO FROM BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TBR.FK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} AND REDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY REORDER

SELECT BRDNO, RENO, CU.SAWON_NAME REWRITER, REDELETEFLAG, REMEMO, REDATE, REPARENT, REDEPTH, REORDER, TBR.FK_SAWON_CODE, CU.PHOTO FROM BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON TBR.FK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE WHERE REDELETEFLAG='N' AND RENO=#{reno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDREPLY WHERE REPARENT=#{reparent} AND RENO!=#{reparent} AND REDELETEFLAG='N'
SELECT RENO FROM BOARDREPLY WHERE REDELETEFLAG='N' AND RENO=#{reno} AND FK_SAWON_CODE=#{FK_SAWON_CODE}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDREPLY TBR1 SET REORDER = REORDER - 1 WHERE RENO=#{reno} AND EXISTS (SELECT TBR1.REORDER, TBR2.RENO FROM BOARDREPLY TBR1, BOARDREPLY TBR2 WHERE TBR2.BRDNO=TBR1.BRDNO AND TBR1.REORDER >TBR2.REORDER AND TBR1.REDELETEFLAG='N' )
mapper.select: SELECT sum(C.cnt) from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM BOARD TB WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.FK_SAWON_CODE=#{searchExt1} UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM BOARDREPLY TBR WHERE TBR.REDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBR.FK_SAWON_CODE=#{searchExt1})C

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as NO, DS.BRDNO, DS.BRDDATE, DS.TYPE as extfield1 , TB.BRDTITLE, BGNAME, CU.SAWON_NAME BRDWRITER , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT FROM ( SELECT TB.BRDNO, BRDDATE, 'files-o' as TYPE FROM BOARD TB WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.FK_SAWON_CODE=#{searchExt1} UNION ALL SELECT BRDNO, TBR.REDATE BRDDATE, 'comments' as TYPE FROM BOARDREPLY TBR WHERE TBR.REDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBR.FK_SAWON_CODE=#{searchExt1} ORDER BY BRDDATE DESC ) DS INNER JOIN BOARD TB ON DS.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO INNER JOIN BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON CU.PK_SAWON_CODE=TB.FK_SAWON_CODE ) A
WHERE A.NO BETWEEN ${rowStart-1} AND ${rowStart+9}
